title: (x) Modern script cursive font / 'L'Arte Del Gelato' - Custom by Jessica Hische {Riccardo}
content:
I'm after the font in the Italian, not the 'GELATO' bit. I've seen it somewhere before, but can't remember. Thanks, Adam

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gelato-1_3662.gif)
author: adamtravis

comments.content:
I am not sure that is a font. Except for the A it seems quite similar to Canada Type's [Apricot](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/apricot/). Mark Simonson's [Coquette](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/coquette/) is less connected than this, but also has a rather similar feel.

- Mike Yanega

You might also like [HT Cartoleria](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/ht-cartoleria/?refby=typographica) and some of these [upright scripts](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115/http:/www.myfonts.com/users/ubjduiig5y/albums/612098/?refby=typographica).

Also: [MeMimas](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?&q=memimas&site=d&sample_text=L'Arte%20del%20Fresco%20ogni%20giorno) and [Pinocchio](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/trueblue/pinocchio/), however the caps are off.  
F

And [Chic Hand](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/chic-hand/) (Flat-it), [Charminette Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/joevanderbos/charminette/light/) (Vanderfont), [P22 Art Deco](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/art-deco-chic/), [Pauline](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/pauline/) (Insigne), [Adonis Old Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/adonis-old-style-sg/) (Spiece Graphics), [Artemisia](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/artemisia-nf/) (Nick's Fonts), and [Londonderry](http://web.archive.org/web/20141031194115/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/londonderry-air-nf/londonderry-air-nf/) (Nick's Fonts)
ooooOOOOoooohhh!!! i'm after that font too! (but i'm afraid it's lettering) but do let me know if you find anything similar. thnx!

I know. I asked her because I like it so much too.

:-)
